import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const RecipeCard = ({ recipe }) => { const ingredients = [recipe.recipes[0].extendedIngredients[0]] console.log('these are the ingredients ' + ingredients[0].name) return ( <> {JSON.stringify(recipe.recipes[0].title).replace(/\"/g, '')}

These are the ingredients
